pr_title: NF: using isDynamic when possible for readability

timeline.message:
NF: rename `isDynamic` to `isInDynamic`

Also add a comment explaining what it means

timeline.bodyText: I don't think isInDynamic works well, either isInDynamicDeck or inDynamicDeck as suggested by Mike would be more readable.
timeline.author: david-allison-1

replies.bodyText: there is something to be said for java method naming conventions, and I like the 'isNNN' naming Arthur went for. 'isInDynamicDeck' is the most semantically precise. Now that I'm pulling these things locally and running them anyway (since travis isn't working for us) I just did this and repushed so there won't be any more back and forth -> merging
replies.author: mikehardy
